activity.title: ohcnetwork/leaderboard#250
activity.text:
@rithviknishad 
I have made data collection via month-wise now to look much better from the UI perspective.
Also for the **aggregate trendline graph** I have tried to take every sort of interaction at the organizational level to showcase the activity
For contributors I have tried to show an increase graph to show growth from start to end 
Let me know if there is something I could do to change
